name: IOUserSerial
desc: The class for building a service that communicates using a serial connection.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the service.

items.name: - Start
items.desc: Starts the current service and associates it with the specified provider.

items.name: - Stop
items.desc: Stops the service associated with the specified provider.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the service.

items.name: - initWith
items.desc: Initializes the private data structures associated with this class.

items.name: - HwActivate
items.desc: Opens the communication channel to the device.

items.name: - HwDeactivate
items.desc: Closes the communication channel to the device.

items.name: - ConnectQueues
items.desc: Creates and configures the buffers that store the data moving to and from the device.

items.name: - DisconnectQueues
items.desc: Releases the buffers that manage data moving to and from the device.

items.name: - HwGetModemStatus
items.desc: Gets the current status of the modem from the hardware.

items.name: - SetModemStatus
items.desc: Sets the modem status to the specified values.

items.name: - HwResetFIFO
items.desc: Sends a command to reset the specified device queues.

items.name: - HwSendBreak
items.desc: Sends a linebreak command to the device.

items.name: - HwProgramBaudRate
items.desc: Sets the communication baud rate to the specified value.

items.name: - HwProgramLatencyTimer
items.desc: Sets the amount of time to wait before sending the current buffer to the device.

items.name: - HwProgramMCR
items.desc: Configure the setings for the device's modem control register (MCR).

items.name: - HwProgramUART
items.desc: Configure the settings for the device's universal asynchronous receiver/transmitter (UART).

items.name: - RxDataAvailable
items.desc: Notifies the system that data from the device is now available.

items.name: - RxFreeSpaceAvailable
items.desc: Notifies your driver that buffer space is available for your device's data.

items.name: - TxDataAvailable
items.desc: Notifies your driver that the system has data for you to transmit to the device.

items.name: - TxFreeSpaceAvailable
items.desc: Notifies the system that the device is ready to accept more data.

items.name: - RxError
items.desc: Reports errors that occurred when receiving data from the device.
